{"id":493953784,"lang":"cpp","time":"2 months, 2 weeks","timestamp":1621168472,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"28 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/493953784/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Add Two Numbers","memory":"70.9 MB","code":"/**\n * Definition for singly-linked list.\n * struct ListNode {\n *     int val;\n *     ListNode *next;\n *     ListNode() : val(0), next(nullptr) {}\n *     ListNode(int x) : val(x), next(nullptr) {}\n *     ListNode(int x, ListNode *next) : val(x), next(next) {}\n * };\n */\nclass Solution {\npublic:\n    ListNode* addTwoNumbers(ListNode* l1, ListNode* l2) {\n        auto n1 = l1;\n        auto n2 = l2;\n        auto carry = 0;\n\n        ListNode* tail = nullptr;\n\n        while (n1 && n2)\n        {\n            auto sum = n1 -> val + n2 -> val + carry;\n            carry = sum / 10;\n            sum = sum % 10;\n\n            n1 -> val = sum;\n\n            tail = n1;\n            n1 = n1 -> next;\n            n2 = n2 -> next;\n        }\n\n        if (n2)\n        {\n            tail -> next = n2;\n            n1 = n2;\n        }\n\n        while (carry && n1)\n        {\n            auto sum = n1 -> val + carry;\n            carry = sum / 10;\n            sum = sum % 10;\n\n            n1 -> val = sum;\n\n            tail = n1;\n            n1 = n1 -> next;\n        }\n        if (carry)\n            tail -> next = new ListNode(carry);\n        return l1;\n\n\n        \n        \n        \n\n        return l1;\n        \n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"add-two-numbers"}
